Greetings to Colombian President
     Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on July 20 sent a message of greetings to Colombian President Andres Pastrana,  on the occasion of the day of Colombian Independence.
   Expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms, the message wished the Colombian people welfare.
